content.intro_1: The 'blue wave' struck big time in the House. Democrats have won a large majority, flipping 60 Republican seats. House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy will resign.
content.intro_2: The GOP is poised for a super majority in Senate, with a gain of 9 seats. A runoff in Mississippi is going to deliver a 60th seat in a December runoff.
content.bullet_1: It's a rough night for women candidates
content.bullet_2: California Democrat Nancy Pelosi has announced she will run for speaker of the House
content.bullet_3: Trump sticks to Trump country as he pushes for GOP wins
